meanings.definition: Having a frizzy texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her hair looked the frizziest after playing outside in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The humidity made her hair the frizziest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The frizziest hair award goes to the girl who touched a Van de Graaff generator.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle, the frizziest vines tangled around the trees like wild snakes.
meanings.sent5: The frizziest clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.sent1: The damp weather caused her hair to frizziest quickly.
meanings.sent2: If you brush curly hair too much, it can frizziest easily.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell made the princess's hair frizziest uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the waves began to frizziest along the shore.
meanings.sent5: The heat from the fire caused the marshmallows to frizziest and brown.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the hairstyles, the frizziest is the most unique.
meanings.sent2: Her hair won the award for being the frizziest at the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The frizziest in the class always stood out with their wild hair.
meanings.sent4: In the land of curls, she was crowned the frizziest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The frizziest of the clouds resembled a fluffy white mountain in the sky.
